snippet.title: RWBY: Arrowfell Teaser Trailer
snippet.description: Take a first look at RWBY: Arrowfell, coming in 2022 for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S/X, and PC from WayForward, Rooster Teeth, and Arc System Works! Play as all four members of Team RWBY in this side-scrolling action-adventure set in the world of RWBY! (Note: Footage is pre-alpha and not final.)
